mapper.select: select userID, username, password, userType from user
select userID, username, password, userType from user where userID=#{id}
select userID, username, password, userType from user where username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
SELECT a.userID , a.username , b.proctorID FROM (SELECT * FROM `user` WHERE userType='proctor') AS a LEFT JOIN proctors AS b ON a.username = b.username WHERE b.proctorID is NULL;
SELECT a.userID , a.username , b.studentID FROM (SELECT * FROM `user` WHERE userType='student') AS a LEFT JOIN student AS b ON a.username = b.username WHERE b.studentID is NULL;
